casebody.data:
FRANK O. LOWDEN, JAMES E. GORMAN, AND JOSEPH B. FLEMING, TRUSTEES OF THE ESTATE OF CHOCTAW, OKLAHOMA & GULF RAILROAD COMPANY, DEBTOR, v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 43074] [93 C. Cls. 584;

314 U. S. —]

Eoyalties on leases of Indian coal lands sold under the act of February 8, 1918; effective date of title; continued possession by lessee; credit for advance royalties on undeveloped coal lands.

Decided May 5, 1941; petition dismissed.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court October 13, 1941.
